ai-tha-ap236:1.4_0: those who have confidence in their heart.
ai-tha-ap236:2.1_0: who honor the world in the world
ai-tha-ap236:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap236:3.4_0: And what is the fruit of that?
ai-tha-ap236:4.2_0: I was swept away by the king,
ai-tha-ap236:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap236:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kisāti.
ai-tha-ap236:7.1_0: The senior monk who was digging the senior by the senior monks.
